heroSection.title:
Festival
Board of
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about the festivities in Roquetes is just a click away.

aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.description: The Festival Board of Roquetes is an independent, non-political, non-profit organization responsible for organizing festivals and events in Roquetes, Tarragona. Here you can find all the information about upcoming events and much more.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Want to participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and take part in setting up festivals and events throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoying all the year's events, including entry to the town's annual major festivals.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the annual crew competition.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: <2>Click here</2> to see the requirements to participate in the crew competition or <1>here</1> to register as a member.

underConstruction.askUs: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us.
